comments.comment:
Enough is enough.!!! Stop accusing the Buddhist Prelates.!!! They came out because UNP candidate promised a separate state for Tamils and the Buddhist Prelates were against the country being separated and they helped to appoint this government.!!! Since they have completed their duty to the country, the Prelates have recede for the time being, but if there is any threat to this country's sovereignty, then the Prelates will not hesitate to come out.!!!
It looks like that as a member of U.N.P. you are devastated  by loosing all the benefits you enjoyed as a Minister.!!! That's why from time to time you and U.N.P. politicians or their supporters come and moan on T.V. interviews and accuse the current government.!!! It was the preference of the majority and the wish of the Sinhalese and some minority.!!! So, No need to moan, we know exactly what happened in the past and we don't want such Sinhalese unfriendly politicians governing the country.!!
It's high time you take some rest, because you seems to be so unhappy and that's the reason you are speaking so much.!!! You have no option, but you can go on criticizing, as there is freedom of speech.!!! But it's the general public decided which Candidate they want  and you or the U.N.P. party is not in a position to change that decision, how ever much you or the others go on speaking MUMBO JUMBO.!!!
comments.author: KENSHIRO

comments.comment: Me sinhala thopita pissuda ban?  Kattiyak ara ali sabri kiyana ekata hoda kiyanawa. Den me minihata hoda kiyanawa. Ubala hithala balaplla lankawe sinhala jathiya sulu jathiya wela mun maha jathiya unoth oya muslim koi mahathayath ekai  apiwa paganawa sahathikai. Ape sinhala minissu wage hemoma lankawe ape sahodarayone kiyala kiyai balana hitapiyaw. Mun api maha jathiya welath helmat nethiwa pare yanawa. Allanna ena polisiyata gahanna yanawa palli walin.api mahajathiya wela munge neethiyata garu kireema mehema nam mun maha jathiya unoth neethiya sinhalayata pamani. Puka denne nethiwa itapiyaw.
